EmailTemplate.name: 8/6/2013 - Storage webinar.Thank you for attending mailer
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Us
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for joining us at our webinar, Reduce Storage Infrastructure Costs and Control Your Virtual Environment. I hope you found the content and discussion applicable to your current virtual datacenter challenges. I’ve attached the link to the recorded webinar here <http://bit.ly/16RFAia>. Feel free to share this with your colleagues. And if you have any questions or ideas, please contact us here. We welcome your suggestions and ideas.
Sincerely, Jonathan Reeve
